languages.text: "Все вы сплетнями сыты, а я говорю вам — не марал{mf||а} Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} руки мирскими делами, выше он{rt_mf||а} всей этой суеты. Да и как по-другому, когда правишь тысячей миров?"
languages.translation_comment: убрать, если ключ взял Абеляр или губернатор

traits.locale_text: "После этого он{mf||а} так долго отчитывал{mf||а} губернатора да такими словами, каких я не слышала! Так старика унизили, что оба лица покраснели".

languages.translation_comment: убрать, если ключ взял Абеляр или губернатор

languages.text: "You people all feast on gossip, but I'm telling you, the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} has never dirtied {rt_mf|his|her} hands with worldly affairs. {rt_mf|He|She} is above all such petty things. How could {rt_mf|he|she} not be, when {rt_mf|he|she} rules over a thousand worlds?"
languages.original_text: "Все вы сплетнями сыты, а я говорю вам — не марал{mf||а} Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} руки мирскими делами, выше он{rt_mf||а} всей этой суеты. Да и как по-другому, когда правишь тысячей миров?"

traits.locale_text: "You people all feast on gossip, but I'm telling you, the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} has never dirtied {rt_mf|his|her} hands with worldly affairs. {rt_mf|He's|She's} above all such petty things. How could {rt_mf|he|she} not be, when {rt_mf|he|she} rules a thousand worlds?"

languages.text: “你们这群人是真喜欢八卦，不过我得告诉你们，那位来自上界的大人根本没处理过这些事情。这些事情太琐碎，根本不配得到{rt_mf|他|她}的关注。{rt_mf|他|她}可是万千世界的主人，怎么会为这种小事操心？”
languages.original_text: "You people all feast on gossip, but I'm telling you, the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} has never dirtied {rt_mf|his|her} hands with worldly affairs. {rt_mf|He|She} is above all such petty things. How could {rt_mf|he|she} not be, when {rt_mf|he|she} rules over a thousand worlds?"

traits.locale_text: “你们这群人是真喜欢八卦，不过我得告诉你们，那位来自上界的大人根本没处理过这些事情。这些事情太琐碎，根本不配得到{rt_mf|他|她}的关注。{rt_mf|他|她}可是万千世界的主人，怎么会为这种小事操心？”
“你们这群人是真喜欢八卦，不过我得告诉你们，那位来自上界的大人根本没处理过这些事情。这些事情太琐碎，根本不配得到{rt_mf|他|她}的关注。{rt_mf|他|她}可是万千世界的主人，怎么会为这种小事操心？”

languages.text: «Todos os alimentáis de rumores, pero os digo que {rt_mf|el Señor|la Señora} Celestial nunca se ha manchado las manos con asuntos terrenales. Está por encima de semejantes naderías... ¿Cómo no iba a estarlo, si gobierna mil mundos?».
languages.original_text: "You people all feast on gossip, but I'm telling you, the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} has never dirtied {rt_mf|his|her} hands with worldly affairs. {rt_mf|He|She} is above all such petty things. How could {rt_mf|he|she} not be, when {rt_mf|he|she} rules over a thousand worlds?"

traits.locale_text: «Todos os alimentáis de rumores, pero os digo que {rt_mf|el Señor|la Señora} Celestial nunca se ha manchado las manos con asuntos terrenales. Está por encima de semejantes naderías... ¿Cómo no iba a estarlo, si gobierna mil mundos?».

languages.text: "Hepiniz dedikoduyla besleniyorsunuz. Size söylüyorum, Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} asla dünyevi meselelerin peşinde koşturmadı. Böyle önemsiz şeylere ayıracak vakti yok. Binlerce dünyayı yönetirken nasıl olsun?"
languages.original_text: "You people all feast on gossip, but I'm telling you, the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} has never dirtied {rt_mf|his|her} hands with worldly affairs. {rt_mf|He|She} is above all such petty things. How could {rt_mf|he|she} not be, when {rt_mf|he|she} rules over a thousand worlds?"

traits.locale_text: "Hepiniz dedikoduyla besleniyorsunuz. Size söylüyorum, Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} asla dünyevi meselelerin peşinde koşturmadı. Böyle önemsiz şeylere ayıracak vakti yok. Binlerce dünyayı yönetirken nasıl olsun?"

"Hepiniz dedikoduyla besleniyorsunuz. Size söylüyorum, Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} asla dünyevi meselelerin peşinde koşturmadı. Böyle önemsiz şeylere ayıracak vakti yok. Binlerce dünyayı yönetirken nasıl olsun?"

languages.text: 「あなたたちは皆、噂に群がってばかりだけど、言っとくよ。天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は世俗の雑事にその手を汚したことなんてないの。{rt_mf|彼|彼女}はそんな卑小なものを超越してるんだよ。千の惑星を統べているというのに、どうして{rt_mf|彼|彼女}がそんなものに関わるわけ？」
languages.original_text: "You people all feast on gossip, but I'm telling you, the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} has never dirtied {rt_mf|his|her} hands with worldly affairs. {rt_mf|He|She} is above all such petty things. How could {rt_mf|he|she} not be, when {rt_mf|he|she} rules over a thousand worlds?"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたたちは皆、噂に群がってばかりだけど、言っとくよ。天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は世俗の雑事にその手を汚したことなんてないの。{rt_mf|彼|彼女}はそんな卑小なものを超越してるんだよ。千の惑星を統べているというのに、どうして{rt_mf|彼|彼女}がそんなものに関わるわけ？」

languages.text: « Vous vous régalez de ragots et de commérages, mais je vous le dis, Sa Céleste Seigneurie ne s'est jamais abaissée à de telles mesquineries. {rt_mf|Il|Elle} est bien au-dessus de ce genre de vilenies. Comment en serait-il autrement puisqu'{rt_mf|il|elle} règne sur un millier de mondes ? »
languages.original_text: "You people all feast on gossip, but I'm telling you, the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} has never dirtied {rt_mf|his|her} hands with worldly affairs. {rt_mf|He|She} is above all such petty things. How could {rt_mf|he|she} not be, when {rt_mf|he|she} rules over a thousand worlds?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous régalez de ragots et de commérages, mais je vous le dis, Sa Céleste Seigneurie ne s'est jamais abaissée à de telles mesquineries. {rt_mf|Il|Elle} est bien au-dessus de ce genre de vilenies. Comment en serait-il autrement puisqu'{rt_mf|il|elle} règne sur un millier de mondes ? »

« Vous vous régalez de ragots et de commérages, mais je vous le dis, sa Céleste Seigneurie ne s'est jamais abaissée à de telles mesquineries. {rt_mf|Il|Elle} est bien au-dessus de ce genre de vilenies. Comment en serait-il autrement puisqu'{rt_mf|il|elle} règne un millier de mondes ? »

languages.text: "Ihr Leute lebt alle vom Klatsch, aber ich sage Euch, {rt_mf|der himmlische Herr|die himmlische Herrin} hat sich niemals die Hände mit weltlichen Angelegenheiten beschmutzt. {rt_mf|Er|Sie} steht über solchen Banalitäten. Wie könnte es auch anders ein, herrscht {rt_mf|Er|Sie} doch über tausend Welten."
languages.original_text: "You people all feast on gossip, but I'm telling you, the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} has never dirtied {rt_mf|his|her} hands with worldly affairs. {rt_mf|He|She} is above all such petty things. How could {rt_mf|he|she} not be, when {rt_mf|he|she} rules over a thousand worlds?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr Leute lebt alle vom Klatsch, aber ich sage Euch, {rt_mf|der himmlische Herr|die himmlische Herrin} hat sich niemals die Hände mit weltlichen Angelegenheiten beschmutzt. {rt_mf|Er|Sie} steht über solchen Banalitäten. Wie könnte es auch anders ein, herrscht {rt_mf|Er|Sie} doch über tausend Welten."
